Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: Our work is done. You brought me the ten propylon indices, and I gave you a master index.
Now I'll send you to whichever stronghold you wish, anytime you wish. Just tell me which stronghold you want to visit.
Hlormaren, Marandus, Falasmaryon, Valenvaryon, Indoranyon, Berandas, Andasreth, Rotheran, Falensarano, or Telasero, and I'll send you there directly.
Finally I have all ten indices. Here's your 500 gold, and a master index. Here's how it will work.
If you want to travel to a Dunmer stronghold, just speak with me here, and bring the master index with you.
I'll send you directly to whichever stronghold you wish.
And for return trips, just make sure you have your master index with you when you activate the propylons in the propylon chambers...
...and you'll be transported here to me directly.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
player.removeitem mwindextelas 1
player.additem gold001 500
setstage fbmwMSMasterIndex 50
player.additem 0indexumaster 1
modDisposition player 10
addtopic fbmwMasterIndexTravel

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: Just one more index. Bring me the Telasero Propylon Index, and then I'll make you a master index so you can travel to the Dunmer strongholds at will.
Here's 500 gold for the Falensarano index. One more to go -- the Telasero Propylon Index.
It is in Telasero, a Dunmer stronghold between Suran and Molag Mar, on the southern coast of the Molag Amur region.
All I know is that it is in a dark place, in a troth with a number of other objects. Not much to go on, I'm afraid.
And I've heard it is a very, very bad place.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
ShowMap mwTelaseroMapMarker
player.removeitem mwindexfalen 1
player.additem gold001 500
setstage fbmwMSMasterIndex 45
modDisposition player 5

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: Bring me the Falensarano Propylon Index. Then we'll talk about the others.
Here's 500 gold for the Rotheran index. Now bring me the Falensarano Propylon Index.
This was last known in the possession of an obscure but tough-looking outlander named Huunen.
He was last seen headed for Maelkashishi, a Daedric shrine on the western edge of the mountains west of Maar Gan. It is a bad place.
He's probably dead. And locating his corpse there -- and presumably the index -- may be tough.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
player.removeitem mwindexroth 1
player.additem gold001 500
setstage fbmwMSMasterIndex 40
modDisposition player 5

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: Bring me the Rotheran Propylon Index. Then we'll talk about the others.
Here's 500 gold for the Andasreth index. Now bring me the Rotheran Propylon Index. Rols Ienith has the index.
He's a deranged outlaw, and you'll probably have to kill him to get it.
He lives in something called the Communal Hut on top of Rotheran, a Dunmer stronghold on the southern tip of Dagon Fel island.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
ShowMap mwRotheranMapMarker
player.removeitem mwindexandra 1

setstage fbmwMSMasterIndex 35
modDisposition player 5

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: Bring me the Andasreth Propylon Index. Then we'll talk about the others.
Good. Here's 500 gold. Now bring me the Andasreth Propylon Index.
A Dark Elf troublemaker named Brilnosu Llarys owns the index, but I've learned she doesn't carry it on her person.
Her hide-out is in a dome on top of the Dunmer stronghold called Hlormaren, on the coast, due west of Balmora. Search carefully there for the index.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:

player.removeitem mwindexberan 1

setstage fbmwMSMasterIndex 30
modDisposition player 5

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: Bring me the Berandas Propylon Index. Then we'll talk about the others.
Here's 500 gold for the Indoranyon Index. Now bring me the Berandas Propylon Index. All I know is that the wizard Baladas Demnevanni of Gnisis has it
His tower is named Arvs Drelen. The folk of Gnisis seem terrified of him, but he's lived right among them for years, so he can't be all that bad.

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: Bring me the Indoranyon Propylon Index. Then we'll talk about the others.
Here's your 500 gold. Next I want the Indoranyon Propylon Index.
Its current owner, Divayth Fyr, the old and powerful Telvanni wizard of Tel Fyr, a collector of antiquities, may not want to part with it.

player.removeitem mwindexvalen 1

modDisposition player 5

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: Bring me the Valenvaryon Propylon Index. Then we'll talk about the others.
Here's 500 gold. Next bring me the Valenvaryon Propylon Index.
Nibani Maesa, a Wise Woman of the Urshilaku Ashlander tribe in Urshilaku Camp, has this index.
She may not know its worth -- perhaps you can buy it from her cheaply.

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: Bring me the Falasmaryon Propylon Index. Then we'll talk about the others.
We're making excellent progress. Here's 500 gold. Now bring me the Falasmaryon Propylon Index.
A pilgrim with no idea of the thing's value gave it as an offering to the shrine at Maar Gan.
Shouldn't present any problem for an enterprising adventurer like yourself.

ShowMap mvMaarGanmapmarker
player.removeitem mwindexmaran 1
player.additem gold001 500
setstage fbmwMSMasterIndex 10
modDisposition player 5

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: Bring me the Marandus Propylon Index. Then we'll talk about the others.
Excellent. Here's your 500 gold. Now bring me the Marandus Propylon Index.
I've learned it was packed with some other things and delivered to the St. Olms Temple in Vivec.
Of course those priests would have no idea of the value of the thing. Probably just threw it on the floor.
Just look around for empty crates in a storage area. Look carefully -- it's tiny and grey, and easily overlooked in poor lighting.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
player.removeitem mwindexhlor 1
player.additem gold001 500
setstage fbmwMSMasterIndex 5
modDisposition player 5

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: First bring me the Hlormaren Propylon Index. Then we'll talk about the others.
I have a proposition. There's a teleportation artifact called a 'propylon index'. I know where to find ten of these propylon indices.
I'll tell you where to find one. You bring it to me, and I'll pay you 500 gold and tell you where to find the next one.
And when you've brought me all ten, I'll make you a master propylon index, so you can travel back and forth between Caldera and the ten propylon chambers all over Vvardenfell.
If you're interested, I'll tell you where to look for the first one.
